verbose_text: Considering that APP is overexpressed in atherosclerosis-prone regions of the human and mouse aorta XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, it is plausible to assume that APP levels are associated with arterial plaque formation and thus, apart from epidemiological and pathophysiological factors, might serve as a biochemical link between AD and atherosclerosis XREF_BIBR.
